title: Postnatal donor
description: Base schema for donors or strains.
comment: This object type is abstract. These properties are inherited by other object types

age.title: Age
age.description: The age or age range of the donor when biological material was sampled.
age.comment: This is gestational time for fetal and embryonic samples. We allow a generic over 90 for privacy purposes.

age_units.title: Age units
age_units.description: The unit used to measure the age of the donor when biological material was sampled.
